channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Filter Light Damaged, 15th December
item.description:
The filter light has become detached from the main traffic light, rendering it unusable as you cannot see it.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 90 Lansdown Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2ft by 9 inch by 3 inches deep approx, 15th December
item.description:
It it is a large and dangerous pothole. I have written to Shire Hall enclosing photograph.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): The Birches Cold Pool Lane, Badgeworth
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken manhole cover., 15th December
item.description:
This has been broken for nearly 9 months. every time a vehicle goes over it there is a loud noise. People living near it have been disturbed constantly. The Council were informed months ago, nothing has been done.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 52 Ruby Avenue, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pavements both sides of Spencer Avenue completely overgrown, 15th December
item.description:
Can somebody please come and trim the hedges?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 2 Spenser Avenue, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Gas canister, 14th December
item.description:
Blue gas canister left in alleyway

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 5 New Street, Cheltenham

item.title: Obstruction of highway, 14th December
item.description:
Construction of new private parking space in Croft Lane encroaching on Highway and restricting vehicle access for residents.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 7a Upper Norwood Street, Cheltenham

item.title: Flytipping, 14th December
item.description:
Flytipping on Dog Lane during the night. Vehicles are driving onto soft verges beside A417 to pass it. Reported to police on 101 number who refused to do anything

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Dog Lane, Witcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: General fly tipping of a beds and mattresses in the bin area for the shops at Edinburgh Place, 14th December
item.description:
Can the neighbourhood team investigate please, if this of the bins for the residents then it is not very pleasant and is probably infested with rats

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 84 Edinburgh Place, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Shed roof and flowerbed of Italo close, 14th December
item.description:
There is a shed roof in the flowerbed that needs picking up also somebody has put paving slabs on the flowerbed further down.Perhaps the neighbourhood team needs to take a look

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Othello Close, Cheltenham

item.title: City fibre steel plates left at the end of Kipling Road, 14th December
item.description:
Three steel plates left on the grass grass may well need remediation can somebody please tell city fibre

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 80 Kipling Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole in middle of the road (Northern section of Andover Street), 13th December
item.description:
This pothole was circled with white when others in Andover Street were similarly marked. The others were repaired some while ago but this one was not: it must have been missed. It is impossible to avoid as it in the middle of the road, between the lines of parked cars. Could it please be filled in as soon as possible.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 12 Andover Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep set of potholes outside balcarras school, 13th December
item.description:
I drove through these potholes in the dark resulting in a damage to the tyre and possibly also suspension. It was dark and the holes were not highlighted

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Firbank Balcarras Road, Charlton Kings
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: IKEA shelving unit on the grass verge of Buckingham Avenue for several weeks, 13th December
item.description:
I think it’s ruined now because of the wet and needs to be called fly tipping. while you’re here pick up the frame for the road sign just round the corner on Devon thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 5 Buckingham Avenue, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown hedge obstructing narrow footpath, 12th December
item.description:
Please trim the hedge alongside the footpath on Shurdington Road, connecting the Farmfield Road bus stop with Leckhampton Gate. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Shurdington Road, Up Hatherley

item.title: Large and deepening pit hole on the corner of Tommy Taylor’s Lane and Swindon Lane, 12th December
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 2 Tommy Taylor's Lane, Cheltenham

item.title: Graffiti on wall, 12th December
item.description:
The word "sheeple" has been painted to a wall on this street - please could it be painted out - thank you
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 4 Wellington Street, Cheltenham

item.title: Large amount of litter thrown in hedge, 12th December
item.description:
There is a large amount of litter thrown into the hedge by this car park.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Faithfull House Suffolk Square, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Faulty temporary lights, 12th December
item.description:
I have now seen at least three occasions (and now today) when the temporary pedestrian crossing lights have failed to red causing confusion and delay. There was never any pedestrian lights on this road so why add this complication during the road works? In addition I have seen motorists confused by these lights in proximity to contra flow lights - leading to near misses. This is an important ambulance route and so needs to be kept moving. This is not helping. Please review urgently.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): The Brackens OLD GLOUCESTER, Staverton
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Very wonky lamppost outside five Brooklyn Road, 12th December
item.description:
This lamppost has recently started leaning severely I don’t know what happened it’s showing no signs of being hit so maybe all the rain has made the ground below it soft

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 7 Brooklyn Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rapeseed oil drums, 12th December
item.description:
The drums in the picture have been dumped next to the skip ( which has been there for some weeks and is locked )

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Claremont Lodge Montpellier Spa Road, Cheltenham
